snippet.title: Remothered: Broken Porcelain - Dev Diary #1
snippet.description:
Take an in-depth dive into the unsettling themes and inescapable tension of Remothered: Broken Porcelain, the survival horror game reaching PlayStation 4, Nintendo Switch, PC, and Xbox One later this year. Wishlist it now: http://bit.ly/remothered-steam

Remothered is a game by Darril Arts, created and directed by Chris Darril and developed by Stormind Games.

This video details how author Chris Darril’s aspirations for a trilogy of novels inspired a cult classic game series, drawing from quintessential works of horror including Rosemary’s Baby, The Birds, and Psycho to inform a gripping mystery brought to life by Stormind Games’ suspenseful gameplay. View the full video to learn how Remothered: Broken Porcelain’s alluring cast and the larger-than-life conflicts overarching their individual motives are shaping up to be one of this year’s most anticipated horror experiences. 

Remothered: Broken Porcelain expands on the acclaimed cult classic Remothered: Tormented Fathers’ shocking narrative, reuniting players with Rosemary Reed and her tireless pursuit of truth while introducing a new heroine, Jennifer. Drawn to the troubled Ashmann Inn, Jennifer must master resourcefulness to survive the supernatural threats lurking around every corner, avoiding encounters whenever possible and desperately fending off death when stealth fails her.
